cause.description:
Bad breath, Face filled with hatred, Children, we are titled as marginalized, And we remain in spite of us, scorned.
Street, diseases Street, violences Street, miseries Street, nightmares Street, desolations What do you say about our childhood, What do you want for our adolescence, What do you make out of our taken joy?
Rains and dew, Sun and cold, Thirst and hunger, Despair and sorrow, We knew you.
Pavements did we know, Macadams did we recognize, Beaches did we furrow, Dumps did we foraged, For the least daily bread. Begging's prisoners, We seek profits of cause. By avoiding with accuracy Psychosis, to drive back cowardice.
Street, bullying Street, myseries Street, embraces Of the pure sufferings . There are too many melancholies For a so short life. So then, which life If not ours, of happiness the desire.
Elie KPANKOU
1. Children are the mind of a great tomorrow !
2. Will Streets become school and teachers for our own children ?
3. They do not know how to laugh any more !
cause.mission: Make children feel the happiness they lost again!
cause.name: Save children's life
